cat <<CSS <link href='file://$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/css/default.css' type='text/css'> <style>table { font-size: 9pt; } td { text-align: right; }</style> CSS
require_cmd mysql
query=${TM_SELECTED_TEXT:-$TM_CURRENT_LINE} echo -n "$query"|pre
mysql -e "$query" \ -u"${MYSQL_USER:-$USER}" -p"$MYSQL_PWD" \ -h"${MYSQL_HOST:-localhost}" -P"${MYSQL_PORT:-3306}" \ --html "$MYSQL_DB"|perl -pe 's/(?<=<TABLE )BORDER=1/class="graybox" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5"/'
echo -n "Query completed"|pre
